subsection.name: Prerequisites
subsection.p: MaPSeq is %100 Java and is built using the Apache Maven build system.

ul.li: Java 1.7+ (ensure JAVA_HOME is set in your environment)
mvn clean install (this is the first command that should be run)
mvn eclipse:eclipse (used to create .project & .classpath files for all projects)

subsection.name: Misc.
subsection.p: Setting the following helps ensure that the MaPSeq builds successfully: export JAVA_OPTS="-XX:MaxPermSize=768m -XX:-UseSplitVerifier -Xmx4g" export MAVEN_OPTS="$JAVA_OPTS"
